urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @VikasSi46611502 Mr Singh, you can carry your powerbank and battery-operated trimmer with you in your hand luggage only. Please visit https://t.co/fJVKU8d0uF for more details on content carriage/ restriction. ~Yashica
@xyxsh2301 Hi, we request you to DM us the PNR so we can check and assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@vipin_talwar Mr Talwar, we are highlighting this to our concerned team immediately for further assistance. Please bear with us during this interim. ~Yashica
@DrAbdulsamad85 Sir, we believe our customer relations team is in touch with you over e-mail. We request you to revert back to the same trail mail for further updates. ~Yashica
@DelhiIndia2021 Hi, as checked, the booking was canceled recently and the card used for payment was declined. We request you to kindly wait for 48 hours and then recheck your refund status. ~Yashica

@Anujasrivas121 Ma'am, we request you to DM us your PNR along with your medical documents duly signed and stamped by the treating doctor so we can proceed with the cancellation waiver and assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@DRsanjeebrout1 Dr Rout, we request you to DM us your PNR so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @Avinash50623302 Mr Singh, please visit https://t.co/RUEx6oJmMH link to download your itinerary with the amount details. Should you require further assistance, please write to us again.  ~Yashica

@shyam_dhn Sir, we regret your recent experience with us and we assure you all our aircraft undergo fumigation before every flight. We are raising this with our concerned team right away and hope to avoid such incidents in your future flights with us. ~Yashica
@NikhilChandra55 Sir, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. Keep a track of our website.~Vaishali
@SamirVyas18 Sir, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. Keep a track of our website.~Vaishali
@AkshayJTabla Sure, sir. We'll do the needful.~Vaishali

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @Imashu29Shu Sir, the rules vary from country to country. We request you to kindly visit https://t.co/ZwwXgF9of7 link for more details. ~Yashica

@Imashu29Shu Sir, an RT-PCR test not older than 72 hours will be mandatory to carry. You will also need to login to the air suvidha portal before completing your check-in. Should you require further assistance, we are just a DM away. ~Yashica
@vikram_me08 Sir, we request you to DM us your PNR as well as your PIR (property irregularity report) issued by the arrival airport so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Thamburanmm We are concerned to know this and wish you all a speedy recovery. Could you please share your PNR an dcontact details via DM so we may connect with you.~Vaishali

A GIF of things to come.

Our new exclusive menu of 22 delectable preparations of local hits from kitchens and streets around the world is now ready to pre-book. Prepared and served on the same day, have a whiff of it yourself. #AiromaticFresh #goIndiGo https://t.co/FTz57GJRpk https://t.co/e16qtVxMCo

@Panktm Sir, we regret such an experience. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. We sincerely hope to serve you better in the future. ~Vaishali
@Aditi0385 Ma'am, we believe that your concern has been addressed by our team. ~Prahlad

@TRamamohan Hi, we highly appreciate you highlighting this to us and request you to DM us your PNR so we can raise this further to our concerned team for necessary measures. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@meVaibhav7 Sir, we've replied to your DM. Please check. ~Shreya
@AkshayJTabla Pleasure to hear such awesome words from you. Thank you for your continued support. We'll surely pass on the Kudos! #goIndiGo ~Vaishali

data.text: Sir, thank you for the green flag to this new sector of opportunities. This will add a new canvas for travel and commerce between the heritage city Gwalior and the commerce hub Mumbai. Looking forward to seeing everyone on-board real soon. https://t.co/fAZ1d6WqJ5

@mahirah_zubair We are glad to know that our teammate assisted you well and thank you for your appreciation. We'll surely convey your compliments to our team at Changi airport and look forward to your pleasant company on-board again soon. ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo
@Durga21539 Hi, this doesn't look right to us. Please share your PNR and a copy of PIR issued by the arrival airport via DM so we may look into it. ~Ojasvi
@bhatiapranita Ms Bhatia, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please share the transaction details and your contact number via DM so we can assist at the earliest. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@Parthdeveloper Hi, you may carry it in your hand baggage. ~Ojasvi
@Hamsahamu1 Hi, this doesn't look right to us. Please share your PNR via DM so we can assist you at the earliest. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@handa_sidhika We believe our customer relations team is in touch with you. Please write back to them for further assistance on this. ~Prahlad
@shiva_ip2006 Sir, our team tried calling you, however, couldn't establish a connection. Please share a convenient time to speak. ~Prahlad
@detoxifiedyash Hi, we are concerned to know this. Please share your PNR via DM so we can assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@dudejaaman Sir, please share your PNR via DM so we may assist you. ~Prahlad
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@aviksahaindia Mr Saha, we're concerned to learn about the recent experience. We ensure to offer a seamless transfer to the connecting flight, and our team met Ms Saha and assisted her with the boarding. We truly value your patronage and would love to see you all onboard soon, again. ~Snigdha
@Blueshant Sir, we believe that your concern has been addressed by our team. ~Prahlad

@surendr22384189 Sir, as checked only late reporting at the counters was the only reason we could not accept on the same flight. We try to accept all the passengers reporting marginally late, unfortunately, every time this may not be possible for us. We request your understanding. ~Prahlad
@ArchanaLalwani Ma'am, please share the PNR along with your contact number via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @ArchanaLalwani Ma'am, we never wish our passengers to go through any hassle. You may click on the Plan B link here https://t.co/2OUXTgsgoO to book an alternate flight or cancel at no charge. ~Ojasvi

@SamareshA73 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please let us know if the same was reported to the arrival staff. Please DM us the PIR copy of the reported incident so we can look into it. ~Ojasvi

@anantk Sir, thank you for taking the time to meet us. We try and ensure to offer a seamless experience and this was certainly not intended. Be rest assured that this has been highlighted further for close review. We look forward to seeing you soon on board. ~Snigdha
@Aviral85028875 Sir, we are concerned to know this. Please share your PNR via DM so we can get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @Aagan86 Sir, you may carry lotion in check-in luggage. Please visit https://t.co/6wR4yAsQFi to know more. ~Ojasvi

@AkashHuMai Sir, we always advise our passengers to report at least 2 hours prior to departure, in order to complete the pre-boarding formalities and to avoid any last-minute hassle. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@RishavRajMaroti Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@PradipM72734652 Sir, our fares are dynamic in nature and may change at any time subject to seat availability. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@ErHoneybehal Hi! We regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya
@omjha_k Sir, please share your PNR and contact details via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @mvghadi27 Sir, the necessary refund has been processed from our end. Please visit https://t.co/ZFvpp2DeMh to check the real-time status of your refund and reach out to the concerned bank for more information in this regard. ~Prahlad
@ishachauhan0887 Ma'am, we regret the wait. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@eksatya1 Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we can check and advise. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @ankur_a1 Sir, we regret to know about the change in your flight schedule. As checked, the flight has been rescheduled because of operational reasons. You may visit https://t.co/2OUXTgsgoO to book an alternate flight or cancel at no charge. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @SadbhavPainuly Sir, you may carry 2 laptops, however, they will need to be clubbed in 1 single piece of hand luggage not exceeding the hand luggage restriction of 7 kilos in total. We hope the information was useful, for more details please visit https://t.co/fJVKU8d0uF link. ~Shreya

@vamankulkarni11 We believe our team has contacted and addressed your concern. We have taken a note of your feedback
Hope on serving well in future. ~Shreya
@GautamM55280538 Sir, we regret the experience. Please allow us sometime to check this. ~Shreya

@nksachan Sir, web check-in is not a mandatory service, however, we always advise our passengers to complete the same prior to the time of scheduled departure for a smooth check-in experience. ~Ojasvi
@naqiya_abbas Hi, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you DM us your PNR so we can assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@Anil5 Thank you for the kind words, Mr Gulati. We take pride in our work and our sincerest hope is that it helps each one of our customers. Wishing Gauranshi the best for all her future tournaments! ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@egunda Sir, sorry for the wait. We'd request you to contact our airport team right away for real time assistance. Further, we're sharing your feedback with the concerned team. ~Linda
@shreysinh Hi, you may carry it in check-in baggage. ~Linda
@kailashrathi Mr Rathi, we're concerned to know more about your experience. Please DM us in detail what went wrong along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Fcachandansingh Mr Singh, we try our best to keep customers informed for any anticipated schedule change well before time so passengers can prepare themselves accordingly. However, please know given the nature of our operation unanticipated schedule change can occur at any point in time. ~Linda

@Fcachandansingh Mr Singh, delays are equally painful for us. It is only under extreme uncontrollable situation we're compelled to make such changes in the schedule. We look forward to your kind understanding in this regard. ~Linda
@kartik_pitale Mr Pitale, we're here to assist you. Please DM us your PNR along with contact number. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@subra51 wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda (2/2)

@subra51 Hi, charges apply only towards advanced seat selection. If you do not have a preferred seat, you can choose any of the free seats online, subject to availability or opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in (1/2)
@makzartVEN Mr Banerjee, thank you for the kudos. Your message will be passed on to Shubhomoy. :) ~Linda
@sahilTamak11 Mr Tamak, we're here to assist you. Please DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@LOLrakshak Ms Srinivasan, we regret the experience. Please DM us your PNR so we can check & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@guptavivek29 Mr Gupta, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Cheapforme_net Hi, you can carry both in cabin baggage. ~Linda
@IN_abhijeet08 Sir, please DM your PNR for us to check further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@docaseem Hi, this is for all those customers who do not report to the check-in counter & directly reports to the boarding gate. We hope this clears your doubt. ~Linda

@rakshasund Ms Sund, we regret the experience. However, such minor damage can happen during loading & offloading of baggage. Further, did you inform our airport team upon arrival? Please DM us in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

data.text: @szarita @JM_Scindia @DGCAIndia Ms Laitphlang, we appreciate you taking the time to meet our team. Be assured, your feedback is important to us and will be shared internally. Hope to serve you better on your next trip. ~Linda
@DeJayOfficial Mr Jose, this is unfortunate! Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@3Clrs2Finishes Hi, you can make changes to the booking up to 2 hrs & 4 hrs prior to the domestic & international departure, respectively. ~Linda

@Shripad_Beldona @mlrairport We are glad to see our customers were well looked after by our teammates during this unintended delay. Wishing you a pleasant flight and thank you for choosing IndiGo. ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo
@Aarti1raj Ma'am, could you please DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF us your PNR so we may assist you further? ~Yashica

@SwapnilETCT Thank you for the beautiful shout-out, Sir. We are humbled to read this and would like to share your compliments with our team. Could you please DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF us your PNR for the same? ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo
@raviamar11 Mr Amar, your feedback is important to us and is well noted to be shared with our relevant team for internal review. ~Yashica

@its_dkm Sir, free seats are subject to availability as the same is limited in inventory. Charges are only for preferred seat selection. You may opt for auto-assigned seats during web check-in to avoid any charges. ~Nandita
@DhruvMDhingra1 Sir, we request you to allow us some time. We are getting this checked with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita

urls.title: Conditions of Carriage, Passenger & Baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: For each flight booked on goIndiGo.in, there are general conditions of carriage applicable for carriage of passengers and baggage.

data.text: @AjayUnison Sir, "Cute" stands for 'Common User Terminal Equipment' and is charged by the Airport Authority of India. You may visit https://t.co/anjh8jaZMt for more details on the same. ~Yashica
@Piyush_dhn Sir, we regret the delay in reverting and request you to share more details with us over DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF so we can assist you in a better way. ~Yashica

@onlyUtpat Mr Das, we would be delighted to create a wow moment for Dr Ghosh, however, no commitments can be made. Please DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF us the PNR so we can communicate the details to our team. ~Yashica

@Pooh64382592 Sir, we regret the delay. We try our best to fly on time, however, sometimes due to the uncertain nature of our operating factors, flight schedule changes get unavoidable. Our team is trying its best to get you to your destination ASAP.~ Nandita
@Ajay04374116 Sir, we regret the experience. We request you to share your PNR so, we may check with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@IamAnkitChand Sir, free seats are subject to availability as the same is limited in inventory. The charges are only for advance seat selection. If you do not have a seat preference, you may opt for an auto-seat assignment up to 6 hours prior to the departure which is free of cost.~Nandita
@VKchander so, we may share your feedback with the concerned team for necessary action.~Nandita (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@VKchander Sir, that's certainly not good to see. At times, the seat cushion gets adrift from its Velcro. The same can be repositioned with the help of our crew. However, we request you to share your PNR(1/2)
@pavaniayyagari Ma'am, please DM us your PNR details so we can assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@neeraj999kumar Mr Kumar, it is extremely important to us that our passengers are comfortable and well tended to even in bad weather. We hope you had a pleasant flight and look forward to welcoming you on-board again soon.✈️ ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo

@jha23neha Ms Jha, this is not the experience we intend to deliver. Please DM us your PNR with the relevant documents so we can look into this further and assist you in a better way. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@nehaljain_123 Hi, we have replied to you via DM. Please check.~ Nandita
